english_example_sentence: You will always support the young students in this important project.
russian_example_sentence: Вы всегда будете поддерживать молодых студентов в этом важном проекте.
turkish_example_sentence: Siz bu önemli projede genç öğrencileri her zaman destekleyeceksiniz.
